name: Chat (Simple)
extras:
# This preset just runs the chat model.
# The 'model' is set by the GUI dropdown.
# 'lexicon_key' defaults to 'corpus_lexicon'
# 'style' can be: plain, bullets, outline
chat.style=bullets
chat.max_bullets=5

name: Chat (Web Research)
extras:
# Scrapes the web, analyzes the text, then chats.
webcorpus.query={payload}
webcorpus.lexicon_key=web_lexicon
webcorpus.context_key=web_context
webcorpus.min_term_overlap={payload.length}

intelligence.code_concepts_key=intel_code
intelligence.prose_concepts_key=intel_prose

chat.lexicon_key=intel_prose
chat.style=bullets
chat.max_bullets=8

name: Generate Code (Fresh Scrape)
extras:
# 1. Scrape web, 2. Search DB, 3. Generate Code
# This is a full, slow RAG pipeline.

# 1. Scrape web and save to 'code_corpus.db'
codecorpus.query={payload}
codecorpus.site_include=stackoverflow.com,realpython.com,docs.python.org,geeksforgeeks.org
codecorpus.max_pages=5
codecorpus.db_path=code_corpus.db

# 2. Search 'code_corpus.db' for the same query
codesearch.query={payload}
codesearch.db_path=code_corpus.db
codesearch.export_key=code_context
codesearch.top_k=5

# 3. Generate code using the search results
code.prompt={payload}
code.context_key=code_context

name: Research Topic (Deep Dive)
extras:
# This preset scrapes the general web, then JS-heavy
# sites, then wikipedia, then summarizes the result.
webcorpus.query={payload}
webcorpus.num_results=10
webcorpus.max_fetch=5
webcorpus.lexicon_key=topic_lexicon
webcorpus.context_key=topic_context
webcorpus.append_context=false
webcorpus.min_term_overlap={payload.length}

playwright.query={payload}
playwright.num_results=10
playwright.lexicon_key=topic_lexicon
playwright.context_key=topic_context
playwright.append_context=true
playwright.min_term_overlap={payload.length}

corpus.query={payload}
corpus.provider=wiki_api
corpus.lexicon_key=topic_lexicon
corpus.context_key=topic_context
corpus.append_context=true

tensor.task=summarization
tensor.model=google/flan-t5-base
tensor.generation_prompt="Summarize the following context about {payload}: {payload}"
tensor.max_new_tokens=300
tensor.min_length=50
tensor.inject_tag=summary

name: Find Audio (LinkTracker + JS)
extras:
# Finds .mp3, .wav, .flac, etc. (with JS rendering)
# The prompt {payload} is used as the query.
linktracker.query={payload}

# Set mode to media
linktracker.mode=media

# How many search result pages to scan?
linktracker.scan_limit=5

# Verify links are 200 OK before returning?
linktracker.verify=true

# Use DuckDuckGo or Google CSE
linktracker.engine=duckduckgo

# NEW: enable Playwright JS rendering
linktracker.use_js=true

# NEW: dump all JS links for debugging
linktracker.return_all_js_links=true

name: Find Audio on Archive.org (LinkTracker, DuckDuckGo)
extras:
# Finds .mp3, .wav, .flac, etc. on archive.org
# The prompt {payload} is used as the query.
linktracker.query={payload}

# Audio mode
linktracker.mode=media

# Use Google Custom Search
linktracker.engine=duckduckgo

# Restrict results to archive.org hosts
linktracker.site_require=archive.org,ca.archive.org,web.archive.org

# How many search result pages to scan?
linktracker.scan_limit=5

# Verify links are 200 OK before returning?
linktracker.verify=true

name: Find Images (LinkTracker)
extras:
# Finds .jpg, .png, .gif, .webp, etc.
# The prompt {payload} is used as the query.
linktracker.query={payload}

# Set mode to custom and specify extensions
linktracker.mode=custom
linktracker.extensions=.jpg,.jpeg,.png,.gif,.webp,.svg,.bmp

# Use DuckDuckGo
linktracker.engine=duckduckgo

# How many search result pages to scan?
linktracker.scan_limit=5

# Verify links are 200 OK before returning?
linktracker.verify=true

name: Find All Documents (LinkTracker)
extras:
# Finds .pdf, .doc, .txt, .csv, .xls, etc.
# The prompt {payload} is used as the query.
linktracker.query={payload}

# Use 'docs' mode as a base
linktracker.mode=docs

# Add more document extensions
linktracker.extensions=.pdf,.epub,.mobi,.doc,.docx,.txt,.rtf,.csv,.xls,.xlsx,.ppt,.pptx,.odt

# Use DuckDuckGo
linktracker.engine=duckduckgo

# How many search result pages to scan?
linktracker.scan_limit=5

# Verify links are 200 OK before returning?
linktracker.verify=true

name: Find Videos (Site Specific, Bounded + JS Links)
extras:
# Finds video files/streams/embeds on specific sites.
# The prompt {payload} is used as the query.

pipeline.stages=videotracker

# The prompt {payload} becomes the search query
pipeline.videotracker.query={payload}

# IMPORTANT: List sites to scan (comma-separated)
pipeline.videotracker.sites=archive.org

# How many search results (hub pages) to scan per site
pipeline.videotracker.scan_limit=3

# Use 'duckduckgo' or 'google_cse'
pipeline.videotracker.engine=duckduckgo

# Verify links are 200 OK? (HEAD requests)
pipeline.videotracker.verify=false

# Enable JS rendering via Playwright (if installed)
pipeline.videotracker.use_js=true

# Try to detect video streams w/o extensions via Content-Type
pipeline.videotracker.smart_sniff=false

# Crawl depth: 0 = only hub pages
pipeline.videotracker.max_depth=0

# Limits to prevent "never finishes" behavior
pipeline.videotracker.child_page_limit=4
pipeline.videotracker.max_pages_total=10
pipeline.videotracker.max_links_per_page=200
pipeline.videotracker.max_assets=200

# NEW: dump every JS-gathered link in the final output
pipeline.videotracker.return_all_js_links=true

name: Find Videos (Smart Discovery + JS Links Dump)
extras:
# A smarter pipeline:
# 1. webcorpus finds text-heavy pages.
# 2. playwright finds JS-heavy pages.
# 3. videotracker (in payload mode) scans all found pages.

pipeline.stages=webcorpus|playwright|videotracker

# --- 1. WebCorpus (for blogs, forums, etc.) ---
pipeline.webcorpus.query={payload}
pipeline.webcorpus.num_results=10
pipeline.webcorpus.max_fetch=5
pipeline.webcorpus.inject_context=true
pipeline.webcorpus.inject_lexicon=false

# --- 2. Playwright (for JS sites, discovery) ---
pipeline.playwright.query={payload}
pipeline.playwright.num_general=10
pipeline.playwright.num_per_site=2
pipeline.playwright.target_sites=archive.org
pipeline.playwright.inject_context=true
pipeline.playwright.inject_lexicon=false

# --- 3. VideoTracker (scans the results) ---
# Use payload as the source (skips its own search)
pipeline.videotracker.source=payload
# Still needs query for keyword filtering
pipeline.videotracker.query={payload}
# Scan the pages found by the blocks above
pipeline.videotracker.scan_limit=20
# Use JS to find links on those pages
pipeline.videotracker.use_js=true
# Only scan the hub pages (no deep crawl)
pipeline.videotracker.max_depth=0
# Safety limits
pipeline.videotracker.max_pages_total=20
pipeline.videotracker.max_assets=100
pipeline.videotracker.verify=false

# NEW: dump every JS-gathered link in the final output
pipeline.videotracker.return_all_js_links=true

name: YouTube Search (Videos)
extras:
# Uses YouTube Data API v3.
# The prompt {payload} becomes the search query.
youtube.query={payload}
youtube.max_results=8
youtube.order=relevance
youtube.safe_search=moderate
youtube.export_key=youtube_results
youtube.export_to_memory=true

name: Chat (Google CSE Web Research)
extras:
# Uses Google Custom Search via webcorpus.engine=google_cse
webcorpus.query={payload}
webcorpus.engine=google_cse
webcorpus.num_results=10
webcorpus.max_fetch=6
webcorpus.lexicon_key=web_lexicon
webcorpus.context_key=web_context
webcorpus.append_context=false
webcorpus.min_term_overlap={payload.length}

intelligence.prose_concepts_key=intel_prose

chat.lexicon_key=intel_prose
chat.style=bullets
chat.max_bullets=8

name: Check News (Quick)
extras:
# Fetches a news preset.
# Change 'preset' to another value:
# bbc_world, npr_news, nyt_tech, ars_index, spaceflight_news
news.preset=bbc_world
news.limit=10

name: NASA (Image of Day)
extras:
# Fetches NASA's Image of the Day
nasa.preset=nasa_image_of_the_day
nasa.limit=1

name: NASA (Search Images)
extras:
# Searches NASA's image API.
# The prompt {payload} is used as the query.
nasa.preset=nasa_images_api
nasa.q={payload}
nasa.limit=10

name: Chat (Simple) (Pipeline)
extras:
# Runs the chat model via the pipeline block.
pipeline.stages=chat

# The 'model' is set by the GUI dropdown (and passed to pipeline.chat.model)
pipeline.chat.style=bullets
pipeline.chat.max_bullets=5

name: Chat (Web Research) (Pipeline)
extras:
# Scrapes the web, analyzes, then chats.
pipeline.stages=webcorpus|intelligence|chat

pipeline.webcorpus.query={payload}
pipeline.webcorpus.lexicon_key=web_lexicon
pipeline.webcorpus.context_key=web_context
pipeline.webcorpus.min_term_overlap={payload.length}

pipeline.intelligence.prose_concepts_key=intel_prose

pipeline.chat.lexicon_key=intel_prose
pipeline.chat.style=bullets
pipeline.chat.max_bullets=8

name: Generate Code (Fresh Scrape) (Pipeline)
extras:
# 1. Scrape web, 2. Search DB, 3. Generate Code
pipeline.stages=codecorpus|codesearch|code|self_check

# 1. Scrape web and save to 'code_corpus.db'
pipeline.codecorpus.query={payload}
pipeline.codecorpus.site_include=stackoverflow.com,realpython.com,docs.python.org,geeksforgeeks.org
pipeline.codecorpus.max_pages=5
pipeline.codecorpus.db_path=code_corpus.db

# 2. Search 'code_corpus.db' for the same query
pipeline.codesearch.query={payload}
pipeline.codesearch.db_path=code_corpus.db
pipeline.codesearch.export_key=code_context
pipeline.codesearch.top_k=5

# 3. Generate code using the search results
pipeline.code.prompt={payload}
pipeline.code.model=Salesforce/codet5p-220m-py
pipeline.code.context_key=code_context
pipeline.code.context_chars=1500
pipeline.code.max_new_tokens=256
pipeline.code.num_beams=4
pipeline.code.max_time_sec=180.0

name: Research (Deep Dive) (Pipeline)
extras:
# Runs the full research pipeline.
pipeline.stages=webcorpus|playwright|corpus|tensor|self_check

pipeline.webcorpus.query={payload}
pipeline.webcorpus.num_results=10
pipeline.webcorpus.max_fetch=5
pipeline.webcorpus.context_key=topic_context
pipeline.webcorpus.append_context=false
pipeline.webcorpus.min_term_overlap={payload.length}

pipeline.playwright.query={payload}
pipeline.playwright.num_results=10
pipeline.playwright.context_key=topic_context
pipeline.playwright.append_context=true
pipeline.playwright.min_term_overlap={payload.length}

pipeline.corpus.query={payload}
pipeline.corpus.provider=wiki_api
pipeline.corpus.context_key=topic_context
pipeline.corpus.append_context=true

pipeline.tensor.task=summarization
pipeline.tensor.model=google/flan-t5-base
pipeline.tensor.generation_prompt="Summarize the following context about {payload}: {payload}"
pipeline.tensor.max_new_tokens=300
pipeline.tensor.min_length=50
pipeline.tensor.inject_tag=summary

name: Check News (Quick) (Pipeline)
extras:
# Fetches a news preset via the pipeline block.
pipeline.stages=news

pipeline.news.preset=bbc_world
pipeline.news.limit=10

name: NASA (Image of Day) (Pipeline)
extras:
# Fetches NASA's Image of the Day via the pipeline block.
pipeline.stages=nasa

pipeline.nasa.preset=nasa_image_of_the_day
pipeline.nasa.limit=1

name: NASA (Search Images) (Pipeline)
extras:
# Searches NASA's image API via the pipeline block.
pipeline.stages=nasa

pipeline.nasa.preset=nasa_images_api
pipeline.nasa.q={payload}
pipeline.nasa.limit=10

name: Shopping (Resale Search) (Pipeline)
extras:
# Searches specific resale marketplaces for the item in your prompt.
# Supported sites: grailed, depop, poshmark, mercari, ebay, rakuma, rakuten, yahoo_jp
pipeline.stages=shopping

# The prompt {payload} becomes the search query
pipeline.shopping.query={payload}

# Which sites to check? (Comma separated)
pipeline.shopping.sites=grailed,depop,rakuma,mercari,ebay

# How many results per site?
pipeline.shopping.num_per_site=5

# Filter results by currency symbol (USD, JPY, etc.)
pipeline.shopping.currency=USD

# Timeout per request
pipeline.shopping.timeout=8.0

name: Shopping + Analysis (Concat Pipeline)
extras:
# 1. Search -> 2. Chat Analysis -> 3. Append Links
pipeline.stages=shopping|chat|concat

# Search params
pipeline.shopping.query={payload}
pipeline.shopping.sites=grailed,depop,rakuma,mercari,ebay
pipeline.shopping.num_per_site=6
pipeline.shopping.export_key=shopping_results

# Chat params (Analyzes the list)
pipeline.chat.style=plain
# Note: The chat model will see the list as its input

# Concat params (Stitches output)
# Puts the AI analysis first, then a separator, then the raw JSON list of links
pipeline.concat.parts=payload, text:___, text:### ğŸ”— Source Links (Raw Data), memory:shopping_results
pipeline.concat.sep=\n\n

name: Web Research + Report (Concat Pipeline)
extras:
# 1. Search Web -> 2. Write Report -> 3. Append Context
pipeline.stages=webcorpus|chat|concat

# Search
pipeline.webcorpus.query={payload}
pipeline.webcorpus.context_key=web_context
pipeline.webcorpus.export_context=true
pipeline.webcorpus.min_term_overlap={payload.length}

# Chat
pipeline.chat.include_context=true
pipeline.chat.style=plain

# Concat
pipeline.concat.parts=payload, text:___, text:### ğŸ“‘ References & Context, memory:web_context
pipeline.concat.sep=\n\n

name: Code Solutions + Docs (Fresh Scrape) (Concat Pipeline)
extras:
# 1. Scrape Docs -> 2. Search Docs -> 3. Write Code -> 4. Append Doc Snippets
pipeline.stages=codecorpus|codesearch|code|concat

# 1. Scrape
pipeline.codecorpus.query={payload}
pipeline.codecorpus.db_path=code_corpus.db
pipeline.codecorpus.max_pages=3

# 2. Search
pipeline.codesearch.query={payload}
pipeline.codesearch.db_path=code_corpus.db
pipeline.codesearch.export_key=code_context
pipeline.codesearch.top_k=3

# 3. Generate
pipeline.code.prompt={payload}
pipeline.code.context_key=code_context
pipeline.code.context_chars=2000

# 4. Concat
pipeline.concat.parts=payload, text:___, text:### ğŸ“š Documentation Used, memory:code_context
pipeline.concat.sep=\n\n

name: Enhanced Web Search
extras:
# Scrapes the web, analyzes the text, then chats.
webcorpus.query={payload}
webcorpus.max_fetch=20
webcorpus.timeout=15.0
webcorpus.num_results=20
webcorpus.lexicon_key=web_lexicon
webcorpus.context_key=web_context
webcorpus.min_term_overlap=2
webcorpus.subpipeline=prompt_query
playwright.query={payload}
playwright.lexicon_key=web_lexicon
playwright.context_key=web_context
playwright.min_term_overlap=2
playwright.num_per_site=10
playwright.num_general=20
playwright.subpipeline=prompt_query
intelligence.code_concepts_key=intel_code
intelligence.prose_concepts_key=intel_prose
corpus.query={payload}
corpus.db_path=webcorpus.db
chat.lexicon_key=intel_prose
chat.style=bullets
chat.max_bullets=20
chat.subpipeline=english_chat
prompt.context_key=web_context
prompt.lexicon_key=web_lexicon
hf-llm.max_new_tokens=1000

name: Deep Discovery (Crawler + Camoufox)
extras:
# Pipeline: LinkCrawler (Fast) -> VideoTracker (Deep Camoufox)
pipeline.stages=linkcrawler|videotracker

# --- Stage 1: LinkCrawler ---
pipeline.linkcrawler.query={payload}
pipeline.linkcrawler.max_results=40
pipeline.linkcrawler.links_key=crawled_seeds
pipeline.linkcrawler.timeout=8.0

# --- Stage 2: VideoTracker ---
pipeline.videotracker.memory_sources=crawled_seeds
pipeline.videotracker.query={payload}
pipeline.videotracker.source=search
pipeline.videotracker.use_camoufox=true
pipeline.videotracker.block_domains=true
pipeline.videotracker.block_resources=true
pipeline.videotracker.blocked_resource_types=image,stylesheet,font
pipeline.videotracker.use_js=true
pipeline.videotracker.smart_sniff=true
pipeline.videotracker.min_term_overlap={payload.length}
pipeline.videotracker.max_pages_total=25
pipeline.videotracker.max_links_per_page=100
pipeline.videotracker.return_all_js_links=true
pipeline.videotracker.use_database=true
pipeline.videotracker.db_path=video_corpus.db

# --- Full Sniffer Suite ---
pipeline.videotracker.use_network_sniff=true
pipeline.videotracker.return_network_sniff_links=true
pipeline.videotracker.use_runtime_sniff=true
pipeline.videotracker.return_runtime_sniff_links=true
pipeline.videotracker.use_react_sniff=true
pipeline.videotracker.return_react_sniff_hits=true
pipeline.videotracker.use_interaction_sniff=true
pipeline.videotracker.return_interaction_sniff_hits=true
pipeline.videotracker.use_database_sniff=true
pipeline.videotracker.return_database_sniff_hits=true

name: Deep Asset Discovery (Crawler + LinkTracker)
extras:
# Pipeline: LinkCrawler (Fast) -> LinkTracker (Deep Camoufox)
# Finds generic assets (docs, archives, etc) using the same logic as VideoTracker
pipeline.stages=linkcrawler|linktracker

# --- Stage 1: LinkCrawler ---
pipeline.linkcrawler.query={payload}
pipeline.linkcrawler.max_results=40
pipeline.linkcrawler.links_key=crawled_asset_seeds
pipeline.linkcrawler.timeout=8.0

# --- Stage 2: LinkTracker ---
pipeline.linktracker.memory_sources=crawled_asset_seeds
pipeline.linktracker.query={payload}
# Mode 'media' captures audio/video; change to 'docs' or 'archives' if needed
pipeline.linktracker.mode=media
pipeline.linktracker.use_camoufox=true
pipeline.linktracker.block_domains=true
pipeline.linktracker.block_resources=true
pipeline.linktracker.blocked_resource_types=image,stylesheet,font
pipeline.linktracker.use_js=true
pipeline.linktracker.min_term_overlap={payload.length}
pipeline.linktracker.max_pages_total=25
pipeline.linktracker.max_links_per_page=100
pipeline.linktracker.return_all_js_links=true
pipeline.linktracker.use_database=true
pipeline.linktracker.db_path=link_corpus.db

# --- Full Sniffer Suite ---
pipeline.linktracker.use_network_sniff=true
pipeline.linktracker.return_network_sniff_links=true
pipeline.linktracker.use_runtime_sniff=true
pipeline.linktracker.return_runtime_sniff_links=true
pipeline.linktracker.use_react_sniff=true
pipeline.linktracker.return_react_sniff_hits=true
pipeline.linktracker.use_interaction_sniff=true
pipeline.linktracker.return_interaction_sniff_hits=true
pipeline.linktracker.use_database_sniff=true
pipeline.linktracker.return_database_sniff_hits=true
